definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

pinyin: A1 la1 si1 jia1 Da4 xue2

definition: to try harder/to redouble one's efforts
to try harder/to redouble one's efforts
to accelerate/to step on the gas

sentences.english: I would try to maximize my combat capability, as long as this process goes on," he said.
sentences.chinese: 只要這個過程還在繼續，我就會盡量加大戰鬥能力。

sentences.english: A team at U. C. San Diego had been searching for it.
sentences.chinese: 加大聖地牙哥校區的研究小組一直在尋找這個反射器。

sentences.english: Condusion Enlarges to the youth group's treatment dynamics, completes the prevention work.
sentences.chinese: 結論加大對青年組的治療力度，做好預防工作。

sentences.english: The increase of the deepness of the tap hole will reduce the flow on the bottom of hearth.
sentences.chinese: 死鐵層深度加大時，通過爐底的鐵水流量減小。

sentences.english: The carrot, of carrot-and-stick fame, is not as effective as we've been led to believe.
sentences.chinese: 蘿蔔加大棒中的蘿蔔並沒有我們相信的那麼有效。

sentences.english: Peak updraft strength is slightly enhanced with hodograph curvature.
sentences.chinese: 山頂上升氣流強度隨速矢端跡曲率加大而稍有加強。

sentences.english: Second, step up counter-terrorism efforts and build a safe environment for the Organization’s development.
sentences.chinese: 第二，加大反恐力度，構築本組織發展的安全環境。

sentences.english: Bank scaling up efforts to support the creation of good jobs.
sentences.chinese: 世行正加大工作力度，支持創造好的就業崗位。

sentences.english: Investment in oilseed production base will be expanded.
sentences.chinese: 加大油料生產基地的投資力度。

sentences.english: She started drinking a lot more water. And no soda, not even the diet kind.
sentences.chinese: 她開始加大飲水量，不喝汽水，即便是無糖汽水。

sentences.english: Sandier soils will require lighter and more frequent fertilizations and slightly heavier yearly rates.
sentences.chinese: 沙性大的土壤需要少量多施，以後逐年加大用量。

sentences.english: When I saw poisonous snake on the road I stepped on the gas at onc.
sentences.chinese: 當我看到路上有條毒蛇時，我馬上加大了油門。

sentences.english: I hope to increase the workout after six weeks and so build up the muscles again.
sentences.chinese: 我希望可以在6周後加大訓練量以便於增大臂力。

sentences.english: This new record low continues the trend of steadily shrinking summer sea ice. "We're already set up for a big loss next year, " Serreze notes.
sentences.chinese: 這次新的最低記錄將繼續加大夏季海洋冰縮減的趨勢。

sentences.english: Having such a building within a settlement increases its prestige and greatly increases the education potential of characters brought up here.
sentences.chinese: 建造這樣的大廈能夠增加聲望並加大文化教育。

sentences.english: In English we have “ the carrot and the stick” .
sentences.chinese: 在英語裏，我們有“胡蘿蔔加大棒”的說法。

definition: to try harder/to redouble one's efforts
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
